'''11w47a''' is the first [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.1]], released on November 24, 2011,<ref>{{tweet|jeb_|139696113983827968|So... here's the first one: http://assets.minecraft.net/11w47a/minecraft.jar Note that this is practically identical to version 1.0.1|November 24, 2011}}</ref> which fixed a bug and optimized the game. This is the first snapshot released in 2011, the first snapshot for {{JE}} in general, and the first to use this [[Version formats#Snapshots|naming format]].

== Changes ==
'''Optimizations'''
* Subtle code optimizations.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed a bug with double doors where one may not open correctly.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This snapshot was released on the same day as [[Java Edition 1.0.1|1.0.1]].
